column2: "Aber a Josia hyɛɛ ase dɛ oridzi hen no na oedzi mfe awɔtwe; na odzii hen mfe eduasa biako wɔ Jerusalɛm: na ne na ne dzin dze Jedida
column3: Adaia a ofi Bozkat ne babaa a."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ dza ɔtsen wɔ EWURADZE n’enyiwa do
column3: na ɔnantseew n’egya David no kwan nyinara mu
column4: na ɔanndan ammfa nkyɛn annkɔ enyimfa anaa abankum."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔhen Josia n’afe a otsia duawɔtwe no mu no
column3: nna ɔhen no somaa ɔkyerɛwfo Safan
column4: Mesullam ne ba Azalia ne ba no
column9: ma ombu sika a wɔdze ba EWURADZE fie a abowanoahwɛfo no aboa ano efi ɔman no hɔ no ano:"

column2: "na ma wɔmfa nhyɛ edwumayɛfo a wɔhwɛ EWURADZE fie do no nsa: na ma wɔmfa mma edwumayɛfo a wɔwɔ EWURADZE fie no ma wɔmpempam ofi no n’agow no;"

column4: na abantofo: na wɔmfa ntotɔ ndua na abo a woetwa mfa mpempam ofi no."

column2: "Naaso wɔnnye hɔn emmbu sika a wɔdze hyɛɛ hɔn nsa no ho nkontaa; osiandɛ wɔyɛɛ no nokwar mu."
"Na ɔsɔfopanyin Hilkia see ɔkyerɛwfo Safan dɛ
column3: Mehu mbra nwoma no wɔ EWURADZE fie. Na Hilkia dze nwoma no maa Safan

column2: "Na ɔkyerɛwfo Safan baa ɔhen no nkyɛn
column3: na ɔdze asɛm brɛɛ ɔhen no bio
column5: Wo nkowaa ehue sika no a wohun no ofi no mu no
column6: na woeyi ahyɛ edwumayɛfo a wɔyɛ EWURADZE fi do ahwɛdofo no nsa."

column2: "Na ɔkyerɛwfo Safan kaa kyerɛɛ ɔhen no
column4: Ɔsɔfo Hilkia dze nwoma bi ama me. Na Safan kenkaan no wɔ ɔhen no enyim."

column3: aber a ɔhen no tsee mbra nwoma no mu nsɛm no

column12: wɔ nwoma a woehu yi mu nsɛm no ho: na EWURADZE n’ebufuw a ɔadzɛw wɔ hɛn do no ɔso
column13: osiandɛ hɛn egyanom enntsie nwoma yi mu nsɛm no
column14: dɛ wɔbɛyɛ dɛ mbrɛ dza wɔakyerɛw no hɛn ho no nyinara tse."

column7: sii mu kɔr ɔbaa nkɔnhyɛnyi Hulda
column11: ne yer no nkyɛn; (nna ɔtse Jerusalɛm ne nkyɛmu afa a otsia ebien no mu;) na wɔnye no twetwee nkɔmbɔ."

column4: Israel Nyankopɔn no se nye yi: Hom nkɛka nkyerɛ ɔbarimba a ɔsomaa hom wɔ me nkyɛn no dɛ
column10: mekyerɛ nwoma a Judahen akenkan no mu nsɛm nyinara:"

column3: na wɔakɛhyew eduhuam ama enyame fofor
column4: na wɔdze hɔn nsaano edwuma nyinara eyi me ebufuw; dɛm ntsi m’ebufuhyew bɛdzɛw wɔ bea yi do

column2: "Na Judahen no a ɔsomaa hom dɛ wombebisa EWURADZE hɔ adze no dze
column3: mbrɛ hom nse no nye yi
column5: Israel Nyankopɔn no se nye yi: Ɔfa nsɛm a atse no ho dze
column8: na ebrɛɛ woho adze wɔ EWURADZE enyim aber a etsee dza mekae mitsiaa bea yi
column10: dɛ wɔbɛyɛ amamfo na ndom no
column12: na esu wɔ m’enyim ntsi; mo so metsie wo

column4: mebɛma akɛka w’egyanom ho wɔ nsamankyir
column5: na wɔbɔkora wo akɔ w’adakamona mu wɔ asomdwee mu
column6: nkyii so w’enyiwa nnkohu mbusu a medze reba bea yi do no nyinara. Na wɔbɛkaa asɛm no kyerɛɛ ɔhen no bio."
